title: Nightwolves Siren's Song
description: The Chess game of life is on between The Nightwolves and General Robertson's Dark Coven. Challenge has been issued and accepted between the two. Both now move their pieces into place that will lead to a either end game or a stand off. While the moves are crossing the board, Cat's children find their own games to play that could turn deadly for all of them.
author: Clarrissa Lee Moon
